body.p: Lexington, Kentucky, native. Employed as a trader in Lexington and Frankfort, Kentucky.. Lieutenant Colonel and later Colonel of the 3rd Kentucky Infantry, U.S.A. Resigned his commission on December 7, 1862. Held office as Kentucky Paymaster General from 1863 to 1865.
